1-1.quote: The important thing is not to win every day, but to always fight.
1-1.author:
Waldemar Valle Martins



Vitrais do mundo. São Paulo: Loyola, 1999.

1-2.quote: Greater than the sadness of not having won is the shame of not having fought!
1-2.author:
Rui Barbosa
BUCHSBAUM, P., Frases Geniais, Ediouro Publicações, 2004

1-3.quote: It is better to conquer yourself than to win a thousand battles.
1-3.author:
Buddha



BYROM, Thomas. Dhammapada: The Sayings of the Buddha (1993).

1-4.quote: Whoever dared to conquer and went out to fight, goes further!
1-4.author:
Charlie Brown Jr


Note: Excerpt from the song Nothing is impossible.

1-5.quote: As long as there is the will to fight there will be hope of winning.
1-5.author: Saint Augustine

1-6.quote: It's hard to win a friend in an hour; easy to offend them in a minute.
1-6.author: Chinese Proverb

1-7.quote: The fear of losing takes away the desire to win.
1-7.author: MussumNote: The thought is also attributed to Brazilian football coach Vanderlei Luxemburgo.

1-8.quote: He who does not trust others cannot earn their trust.
1-8.author: Lao-Tzu

1-9.quote: Choosing your time is buying time.
1-9.author:
Francis Bacon



BACON, F., Essays, 1625

1-10.quote: Losing to reason is always a win.
1-10.author: Aldo Novak

1-11.quote: Many know how to make money, but few know how to spend it.
1-11.author: Henry David Thoreau

1-12.quote: We risk losing when we want to win too much.
1-12.author: Jean de La Fontaine

1-13.quote: If you want to be rich, think about saving as much as earning.
1-13.author:
Benjamin Franklin



The Way to Wealth (1758).

1-14.quote: The worthy man earns to live; the less honest man lives to earn.
1-14.author: Jewish Texts

1-15.quote: To gain what is worth having, it may be necessary to lose everything else.
1-15.author: Bernadette Devlin

1-16.quote: The greatest charity is to enable the poor to earn a living.
1-16.author: Jewish Texts

1-17.quote: The world is lost to those who want to win it.
1-17.author: Taoist Texts

1-18.quote: Whoever knows what can be earned in a day never steals.
1-18.author: George Herbert

1-19.quote: Lottery: I think whether you play or not, you have the same chance of winning
1-19.author: Fran Lebowitz

1-20.quote: Avarice loses everything by trying to gain everything.
1-20.author: Jean de La Fontaine

1-21.quote: To win you have to spend.
1-21.author: Erasmus of Rotterdam

1-22.quote: What good is it for a man to conquer the whole world if he loses his soul?
1-22.author:
Jesus Christ
Bible, Mark 8:36

1-23.quote: It's not enough to gain wisdom, you have to use it.
1-23.author: Cicero

1-24.quote: It's no use for man to conquer the Moon if he ends up losing the Earth.
1-24.author: François Mauriac

1-25.quote: It's easy to acquire an enemy; it's difficult to acquire a friend.
1-25.author: Jewish Texts

1-26.quote: Whether you believe you can do something or not, you are right.
1-26.author: Henry Ford

1-27.quote: Believe in justice, but not that which emanates from others but rather your own.
1-27.author: Samurai Code

1-28.quote: The only way to win an argument is to avoid it.
1-28.author: Dale Carnegie

1-29.quote: There is no pain that sleep cannot overcome.
1-29.author: Honoré de Balzac

1-30.quote: The art of winning is learned through defeat.
1-30.author: Simon Bolívar

1-31.quote: Suffering is only once; winning is for eternity.
1-31.author: Soren Kierkegaard

2-1.quote: It's easier to break a bad habit today than tomorrow.
2-1.author: Confucius

2-2.quote: Evil cannot overcome evil. Only good can do that.
2-2.author: Leon Tolstoy

2-3.quote: Nothing is more humiliating than seeing fools succeed where we failed.
2-3.author: Gustave Flaubert

2-4.quote: Wanting to win means having already gone half the way.
2-4.author: Paderewsky

2-5.quote: You can only defeat nature by obeying it.
2-5.author:
Francis Bacon



BACON, F., New Organ or Elements of Interpretation of Nature, 1620

2-6.quote: The first degree of heroism is overcoming fear.
2-6.author: G. Bona

2-7.quote: It's harder to break bad habits than to break rocks.
2-7.author: Jewish Texts

2-8.quote: He who knows how to overcome himself in victory is twice the winner.
2-8.author: Públio Siro

2-9.quote: He who wants to die or win is rarely defeated.
2-9.author: Pierre Corneille

2-10.quote: Art can overcome nature, as long as the artist leaves his mark on it.
2-10.author: Miguel Ângelo

2-11.quote: Only a fighter is someone who knows how to fight with themselves.
2-11.author:
Carlos Drummond de Andrade



"The Inside Out of Things. Aphorisms". Editora Record. 2nd Edition. 1990

2-13.quote: It's easy to dream every night. It's difficult to fight for a dream.
2-13.author: UnknownNote: Excerpt from the poem "Reverence to destiny".

2-14.quote: Man was born to fight and his life is an eternal battle.
2-14.author: Thomas Carlyle

2-15.quote: It's better to fight with good people than to triumph over bad people.
2-15.author: Baltasar Gracián y Morales

2-16.quote: There is only one way to fight against power: to survive it.
2-16.author: Voltaire

2-17.quote: Fighting injustice costs me more than suffering it.
2-17.author: Jeanne Roland

2-18.quote: Dream and you will be free in spirit... fight and you will be free in life.
2-18.author: Che Guevara

2-19.quote: Imagine a new story for your life and believe in it.
2-19.author: Paulo Coelho

2-20.quote: I'd rather lose the war and win the peace.
2-20.author: Bob MarleyNote: Authorship not confirmed.

2-21.quote: Cooperate, man. It's so easy to win me, you just have to do everything to lose me.
2-21.author: Tati Bernardi

2-22.quote: To disregard is to gain consideration.
2-22.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

2-23.quote: If you want to win you have to enter the game of life
2-23.author: Luiz Gasparetto

2-24.quote: Conquering is not enough. You have to know how to seduce.
2-24.author:
Voltaire



Merope (1744).

2-25.quote: The first and best victory is to conquer yourself.
2-25.author: Plato

2-26.quote: Whatever the human mind can conceive, it can achieve.
2-26.author: Napoleon Hill

2-27.quote: The problem isn't winning me over, it's keeping me interested.
2-27.author: Tumblr

2-28.quote: Whoever is able to tame his heart is capable of conquering the world.
2-28.author: Paulo Coelho

2-29.quote: Women are never conquered, they just let themselves be conquered...
2-29.author: Augusto Branco

3-1.quote: Trust: a life to win, seconds to lose.
3-1.author: Tumblr

3-2.quote: He who has an idea is a weird guy until the idea wins.
3-2.author: Mark Twain

3-3.quote: Believe that you can, so you're halfway there.
3-3.author: Theodore Roosevelt

3-4.quote: Believe me, there are people who are not looking for beauty, but for heart.
3-4.author: Cazuza

3-5.quote: It's fine that you believe in God. But go armed.
3-5.author: Millôr Fernandes

3-6.quote: Winning is not about competing with others. It's about defeating your inner enemies.
3-6.author: Roberto Shinyashiki

3-7.quote: Beating yourself is the greatest victory.
3-7.author:
Plato



The Laws

3-8.quote: The greater the difficulties to overcome, the greater the satisfaction.
3-8.author: Cicero

3-9.quote: If you want to beat the whole world, beat yourself.
3-9.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

3-10.quote: Winning by means I don't believe in brings me results I don't need.
3-10.author: Mahatma Gandhi

3-11.quote: Those who can't win in life take revenge by speaking badly of it.
3-11.author: Voltaire

3-12.quote: If wanting is power, wanting is winning.
3-12.author: Rui Barbosa

3-13.quote: I just wanted someone to get through these terribly boring days with me.
3-13.author: Tati Bernardi

3-14.quote: The best way to win an argument is to avoid it
3-14.author: Dale Carnegie

3-15.quote: There would be no right to win if there was no right to forgive.
3-15.author: Eça de Queirós

3-16.quote: The supreme art of war is to defeat the enemy without fighting.
3-16.author: Sun Tzu

3-17.quote: Those who know when to fight and when to wait triumph.
3-17.author: Sun Tzu

3-18.quote: It's better to fight for something than live for nothing.
3-18.author: Winston Churchill

3-19.quote: To be complete, man has to study, work and fight.
3-19.author: Socrates

3-20.quote: The best gift God gave me, life taught me to fight for what is mine...
3-20.author:
Charlie Brown Jr


Note: Excerpt from the song Fight for what is mine.

3-21.quote: It's not enough to dream, you have to fight and believe.
3-21.author: Tumblr

3-22.quote: If life were easy, I wouldn't take pleasure in struggling with it.
3-22.author: Augusto Branco

3-23.quote: You have to know how to fight like a lion, but fight for dreams that are worth it.
3-23.author: Roberto Shinyashiki

3-24.quote: Lose with class, win with boldness, because the world belongs to those who dare.
3-24.author:
Augusto BrancoNote: Although often erroneously attributed to Charles Chaplin, the phrase is an adaptation of an excerpt from the poem "Life" by Augusto Branco
...More

3-25.quote: Cheating at the game and not winning, just a fool.
3-25.author: Voltaire

3-26.quote: I die because I have nothing left on earth to learn and conquer.
3-26.author: Heinrich Kleist

3-27.quote: It is the moral winner who most easily dies to win.
3-27.author: Hugo Hofmannsthal

3-28.quote: What's the point of winning the world and not winning the woman you love
3-28.author: Slim rimography

3-29.quote: It is better to lose with the truth than win with a lie.
3-29.author: Ednilson Emmanoel Cintra

3-30.quote: Believe in yourself or listen to talkers.
3-30.author: F.Black

3-31.quote: You can't win. But there are other ways to fight.
3-31.author:
Obi-Wan kenobi
A New Hope

4-1.quote: Not having the strength to fight was my only forgiveness.
4-1.author: Clarice Lispector

4-2.quote: Knowing how to fight, in itself, is winning.
4-2.author: Rosa Berg

4-3.quote: Is staying in the comfort zone, without taking risks, without fighting, winning?
4-3.author: Érico Macri

4-4.quote: Whoever wants to win will always have the strength to fight.
4-4.author: Yhwh

4-5.quote: Dreaming without realizing is wanting to win the war without fighting
4-5.author: andraus lana

4-6.quote: The limit is just an illusion for those who are afraid to fight.
4-6.author: Hideki Anagusko

4-7.quote: I'd rather lose 100 battles than fight none.
4-7.author: Jefferson de Mello

4-8.quote: Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one.
4-8.author: Albert Einstein

4-9.quote: Studying is not wasting time, studying is investing time.
4-9.author: ARRUDA, JB de.

4-10.quote: Gratitude is the mother of all feelings.
4-10.author: Lair Ribeiro

4-11.quote: There is always something creative within us, we just need to think, plan and produce.
4-11.author: Felipe Teles

4-12.quote: Don't be fooled by words. Fall in love with attitudes!
4-12.author: Luiza Valeriano

4-13.quote: Don't think about what you lost. Think about how much you gained.
4-13.author: Five Steps From You

4-14.quote: Winning a war is as disastrous as losing it.
4-14.author:
Agatha Christie



Agatha Christie, Autobiography, 1977

4-15.quote: The difference between winning and losing is often not giving up.
4-15.author: Walt Disney

4-16.quote: When you have nothing left to lose, you only have something to gain.
4-16.author: Caio Fernando Abreu

4-17.quote: Sometimes you have to be like the waves of the sea, retreat to gain strength.
4-17.author: General Xintilin

4-18.quote: We may not win every battle, but we must always give our best.
4-18.author: Spider-Man

4-19.quote: As in chess, there are times when, to win, you have to sacrifice a piece.
4-19.author: La Casa de Papel

4-20.quote: You have to lose to know how to win.
4-20.author: Steven Tyler

4-21.quote: Growing up is losing some illusions to gain others.
4-21.author: Virginia Woolf

4-22.quote: You want to lose small, I want to win big.
4-22.author: Harvey Specter

4-23.quote: Only when we learn to lose will we prepare to win.
4-23.author: Adalto Angelo Cruz

4-24.quote: If you're going to play, play to win...
4-24.author: 2Pac

4-25.quote: Never start a game you can't win.
4-25.author: david samuel

4-27.quote: You don't need to win every argument. Accept the loss and learn from the other...
4-27.author: Bárbara Coré

4-29.quote: "People with dual personalities use their best to win you over"
4-29.author: Samuel Siqueira Ramos

4-30.quote: The church has the same goal as a movie villain: to conquer the world.
4-30.author: Alan Silva

5-1.quote: To conquer a woman, put yourself in her shoes!
5-1.author: Daniel Balbi

5-2.quote: Knowing how to conquer a woman is an art, knowing how to love her is a gift
5-2.author: Felipe Urias

5-4.quote: "Everything worth having in life takes work to achieve..."
5-4.author: Lourdes Trindade

5-5.quote: Do you want to achieve something? Get calluses on your hands and skin on your knees.
5-5.author: Cris Westphal

5-6.quote: Conquering the world on horseback is easy; dismounting and governing is difficult.
5-6.author: Genghis Khan

5-7.quote: Overcome yourself to achieve something you want!
5-7.author: Elio Barros 757

5-8.quote: Conquering someone is easy, the difficult thing is winning them back...
5-8.author: andre

5-9.quote: To conquer a woman you need to know her most intimate secrets
5-9.author: Michael Bezerra

5-10.quote: I will reign, I will win and I will conquer.
5-10.author: 4th Impact

5-11.quote: We love more what we conquer with suffering.
5-11.author: Aristotle

5-12.quote:
I love the invitation made by looking. You don't need to say anything. 
Just feel.
5-12.author: Aline Goulart

5-13.quote: Believe. Want. Desire. This way you will know how painful it is to want to win.
5-13.author: Aila Santana

5-14.quote: You don't have to be the prettiest to win a heart, believe me.
5-14.author: Vanessa Pimentel

5-15.quote: Those who strive to win win, those who don't fight to win lose.
5-15.author: Edivânia Santos

5-16.quote: The important thing is not to win every battle, but to fight until the end
5-16.author: Portella, Gio

5-17.quote: We can lose or win, but with a friend it's always easier to fight
5-17.author: Raízza Cardoso

5-18.quote: I was not born a winner, I was born to fight and conquer.
5-18.author: Roberta Thornton

5-19.quote: It's not enough to have many dreams. You have to fight to achieve them.
5-19.author: Chú Oliveira

5-20.quote: What I want in this life is to fight to achieve
5-20.author: Felipe Camargo

5-21.quote: I may not conquer, but I will never stop fighting!
5-21.author: ROSANGELA

5-22.quote: Believe in miracles, but don't depend on them.
5-22.author:
Immanuel Kant



Religion within the limits of simple reason (1793). Note: Adapted excerpt that summarizes the original thought: "Sensible men (...) safely believe in regarding the theory, that there are miracles, but in business they establish none".
...More

5-23.quote: Believe in yourself, because even your shadow leaves you in the dark.
5-23.author: Mr. Catra

5-24.quote: Faith, two letters that can change your life, believe me. (Peter Pan)
5-24.author: Walt Disney

5-25.quote: You will always be your best company! Believe me.
5-25.author: Deborah Oliveira

5-26.quote: If you have the power to lie, believe me, I have the magic to pretend to believe!
5-26.author: Matheus Arruda Pinheiro

5-27.quote: ''Don't believe in a smile, evil is in the mind.''
5-27.author: Unknown

5-28.quote: I don't want you to believe me. Only my feelings
5-28.author: Alexandre Boarro

5-29.quote: Life, despite being hard, is magical, so always believe in the unexpected.
5-29.author: Maria Miranda

5-30.quote: Don't believe everything they tell you... try to discover the truth for yourself...
5-30.author: JeZieL L. CarVAlhO

5-31.quote: Don't believe everyone who smiles at you!
5-31.author: Carine

6-1.quote: Believe in what you feel inside, and give your dreams the wings to fly.
6-1.author: Beyoncé

6-2.quote: Believe me, you have the strength to get where you want, you just have to want it
6-2.author: Valmir P. Pires

6-3.quote: Imagine a story, believe in it, make it happen and be ready to live it.
6-3.author: Unknown

6-4.quote: Believe in yourself, before believing in others...
6-4.author: Crislaine Fernanda

6-5.quote: I love you very much, even if sometimes you don't believe my feelings.
6-5.author: Camila Carvalho

6-6.quote: Whether you believe in order or chaos, in the end, it's the same thing.
6-6.author: Riverdale

6-7.quote: Believe in what comes from within, that you will become real.
6-7.author: Samantha Rauber

6-8.quote: I'm not one to say "I love you" but when I say it, believe me!
6-8.author: Ezequias Clarindo

6-9.quote: Only believe in the truth that builds you.
6-9.author: Edson Rufo

6-10.quote: Believe in yourself and God will show you how strong you are.
6-10.author: Silvana Nunes

6-11.quote: Don't believe anything you hear and half of what you see.
6-11.author: Edgar Allan Poe

6-12.quote: Fight even without strength. Believe even without hope.
6-12.author: Aline Aparecida Rocha

6-13.quote: Friendship is something eternal. If it ended, believe me, it wasn't true.
6-13.author: Rhaul Alves

6-14.quote: Always believe that you can be better than you imagine.
6-14.author: Monica Berg

6-15.quote: To win the battle you have to go to battle.
6-15.author: Pedro Wanderley dos Santos

6-16.quote: No obstacle will be as great if your will to win is greater.
6-16.author: Unknown

6-17.quote: To succeed in life, demand a lot from yourself and little from others...
6-17.author: Confucius

6-18.quote: Dream, Fight, Conquer, Everything is possible, You were born to Win.
6-18.author: Andy Orlando

6-19.quote: If you want to win in life, consult three old men.
6-19.author: Chinese Proverb

6-20.quote: It's sad to fail in life, but it's even sadder not to try to win.
6-20.author: Franklin Roosevelt

6-21.quote: Neither win nor lose, but evolve.
6-21.author: Charlie Brown Jr

6-22.quote: It's not a question of winning or losing, it's a question of how you play.
6-22.author: Meredith Grey

6-23.quote: You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it.
6-23.author: Margaret Thatcher

6-24.quote: Giving up something that has no chance of working is a way of winning.
6-24.author: Cibele Dorsa

6-25.quote: Do not be overcome by evil, but overcome evil with good.
6-25.author:
Holy Bible
Romans 12:21

6-26.quote: Winners always want to win again.
6-26.author: Harvey Specter

6-27.quote: How many wars will I have to win for a little peace?
6-27.author: Maria Bethânia

6-28.quote: I will overcome my pain and follow my path.
6-28.author: Anne Frank

6-29.quote: It doesn't matter if it was 10 centimeters, or 10 kilometers. Winning is winning
6-29.author: Toreto Fast and Furious

6-30.quote: Let me win. But if I can't, let me be brave in trying.
6-30.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

7-1.quote: I don't fight because I think I'm going to win. I fight because I have to win.
7-1.author: Bleach

7-2.quote: If you don't play, you will never win.
7-2.author: Charles Bukowski

7-3.quote: Don't go to trial if you're not going to win.
7-3.author: Harvey Specter

7-4.quote: My commitment is to always win.
7-4.author: Dragon Ball

7-5.quote: To succeed in life, demand a lot from yourself and little from others.
7-5.author: Augusto CuryNote: The future of humanity

7-6.quote: Always fight, maybe win, but never give up
7-6.author: Nathan Guilherme

7-7.quote:
Fight? Always Win? Sometimes
Give up? Never!
7-7.author: Walison Santos

7-8.quote: Fight all the battles you can win, but never fight for the sake of fighting.
7-8.author: Shihan Cicero Melo - Hosho Ryu Ninpo

7-9.quote: The strength to fight comes from the will to win!
7-9.author: Lenaglis

7-10.quote: Knock until it opens, persist until it opens.Fight to win!
7-10.author: Samuel Ranner

7-11.quote: To win any battle, you must fight as if you were already dead.
7-11.author: Miyamoto MusashiNote: Citation attributed. Authorship not confirmed.

7-12.quote: Always fight, win, sometimes NEVER give up.
7-12.author: Mmago

7-13.quote:
Always fight...Win Maybe...
Never give up...
7-13.author: Maxwellton

7-14.quote: People want to win but they don't want to fight. Isn't that strange?
7-14.author: Jeozadaque Martins

7-15.quote: Real fighting is never giving up on winning
7-15.author: Risia Brenda

7-16.quote: I was created to fight and born to win.
7-16.author: Nailson Pimenta

7-17.quote: Dare to fight, dare to win
7-17.author: Carlos Lamarca

7-18.quote: Better to overcome the past, take care of the present and fight for the future.
7-18.author: Taiane Mello

7-19.quote: You need to choose the causes you will fight for in this world.
7-19.author:
John Green



GREEN, J. The Fault in Our Stars. Rio de Janeiro: Intrínseca, 2012

7-20.quote: find another way to STAY and FIGHT.
7-20.author: Teen Wolf

7-21.quote: When you love someone, it's worth fighting for, no matter the odds.
7-21.author: Pretty Little Liars

7-22.quote: We defend so much without knowing what to fight for...
7-22.author:
Legião Urbana
Soldados

7-23.quote: I'm not going to fight your war. I'm going to end it.
7-23.author: Captain Marvel

7-24.quote: Fighting is not good, but if you have to fight, win.
7-24.author: Karate Kid

7-25.quote: Being a Saint means fighting against everyday sin.
7-25.author: John Paul II

7-26.quote: I can take care of clouds, but I can't fight an eclipse.
7-26.author: Stephenie Meyer - Eclipse

7-27.quote: Why fight if we can negotiate?
7-27.author: Captain Jack Sparrow

7-28.quote: Now and forever, we will stay until tomorrowAnd we promise to fight for our destiny
7-28.author: Slipknot

7-29.quote: Being a winner is never giving up fighting, even when you're always losing.
7-29.author: Paulo Roberto Avelino de Oliveira

7-30.quote: If you don't fight for something, you will be defeated by anything.
7-30.author:
UnknownNote: Despite being mentioned in the film "Sucker Punch: Mundo Surreal", the true authorship of the phrase is unknown.
...More

7-31.quote: You can't overcome struggles, you simply learn to fight.
7-31.author: Mike Murdock

8-1.quote: Fight and fight, until lambs turn into lions...
8-1.author: Robin Hood

8-2.quote: Because it's... easier to run away than to fight for what you really want.
8-2.author: Pretty Little Liars

8-3.quote: Do you know what's worth fighting for?
8-3.author: Green Day

8-4.quote: I can take care of clouds, but I can't fight an eclipse.
8-4.author: Jacob Black

8-5.quote: Judoka doesn't improve himself to fight, he fights to improve himself.
8-5.author: Jigoro Kano

8-7.quote: Giving up is for cowards and weaklings; fighting for something lost is for idiots!
8-7.author: Diogo Lima

8-8.quote: War is the choice of those who will not fight
8-8.author: Bono Vox

8-9.quote: "Whoever is afraid to fight, doesn't have the courage to live"
8-9.author: Lamharck Dias

8-10.quote: Why fight so much in fear of death if it is the only certainty in life?
8-10.author: Washington rock

8-11.quote: Dean: I'm tired. Tired of struggling with what I'm supposed to be.
8-11.author: Supernatural - season 5 - eps 18

8-12.quote: If life takes you away, fight for every inch.
8-12.author: Five Steps From You

8-14.quote: To succeed in life, you need to do everything with enthusiasm.
8-14.author: Paul Nyssens

8-15.quote: The surest way to avoid failure is to decide to win.
8-15.author: Sheridan

8-16.quote: Whoever dared to conquer and went out to fight, goes further
8-16.author: Preacher Luo

8-17.quote: The biggest defeat in life is when we stop fighting for our dreams
8-17.author: Adriano Menezes

8-18.quote: There is no defeat that defeats those who were born to win.
8-18.author: Unknown

8-20.quote: Once established, the tendency of every belief is to perpetuate itself
8-20.author: Lair Ribeiro

8-21.quote: What matters is not what happens to you, but your perception.
8-21.author: Lair Ribeiro

8-22.quote: If I can choose, I choose to be the best I can be.
8-22.author: CAMILA HARUMI

8-23.quote: Don't run away from your fears, they are not afraid of you.
8-23.author: VALUE ACHIEVEMENT

8-24.quote: It was never a shame to kneel to pray, ask for protection and get up to fight.
8-24.author: Unknown

8-25.quote: You don't win alone. That's the way it is.(Tobio Kageyama)
8-25.author: Haikyuu!!

8-26.quote: Whoever beats someone else is a winner, but whoever beats himself is invincible.
8-26.author: Morihei Ueshiba

8-27.quote: Never underestimate the power of your vision to change your world.
8-27.author: Caio Carneiro

8-28.quote: The force of thought is stronger than we imagine
8-28.author: Luiza Paiva

8-29.quote: God knows the right time to make your dreams come true, believe me.
8-29.author: Erick Pereira

8-31.quote: Don't listen to anyone's negative opinionBelieve in yourself despite everything
8-31.author: Osmar Pinheiro

9-1.quote: If you care so much about winning, then play alone.
9-1.author: Arabic Proverb

9-2.quote: You think you're better, but you know very well that I can beat you.
9-2.author: Ricardo Limão

9-3.quote: Making money is luck. Making money is skill.
9-3.author: Felipe Leone

9-4.quote: Have you ever thought about how much time you waste to earn the money you spend?
9-4.author: Salgado Filho

9-5.quote: Everything you can gain depends on everything you are willing to lose.
9-5.author: Tayrelene do Vale

9-6.quote: Is it the man who earns the money... or is it the other way around?
9-6.author: Arabic Proverb

9-7.quote: If you want to win, you have to know how to lose.
9-7.author: Bruno Barreto

9-8.quote: If I win and you lose, then I will lose too.
9-8.author: Luís Miguel Militão Guerreiro

9-9.quote: To win, you need to risk losing
9-9.author: Carlos Bertini

9-10.quote: It's not worth winning something and losing it.
9-10.author: karolina s. Abreu

9-11.quote: I lost you, without even trying to win.
9-11.author: Yohanna

9-12.quote: We must win with grace and lose with dignity.
9-12.author: David Ben Schwantes

9-13.quote: Want to gain millions of followers? Poke a hive!
9-13.author: Eduardo Costa

9-14.quote: The difference between winning and losing, most of the time, is not giving up.
9-14.author: Walt Disney

9-15.quote: Not that I just want to win, but I'm tired of losing
9-15.author: Unknown

9-16.quote: The time it takes to earn money kills the essential part of life.
9-16.author: The Big Short

9-17.quote: Life is like a game of chess where you have to think to win.
9-17.author: Igor Silveira Vasconcelos

9-18.quote: Regardless of the choice, you have to lose to win.
9-18.author: joanderson the joker

9-19.quote: By peace and trust one can win the dayDespite all its losses.
9-19.author: Led Zeppelin

9-20.quote: When we enter a war, it is to win.
9-20.author: Bill Clinton

9-21.quote: "The only thing left is for me to want you, win you and lose you"
9-21.author: Lulu Santos

9-22.quote: Unfortunately there is no way to gain the world without losing a little of ourselves.
9-22.author:
Fred Elboni



My Private Universe

9-23.quote: Trust is something so fragile that it can be gained or lost in an instant.
9-23.author: As Telefonistas

9-24.quote: You didn't lose anything, you just stopped winning!
9-24.author: Larice Carla Oliveira

9-25.quote: You can't win a race without starting the car.
9-25.author: Sean

9-26.quote: If you win, say nothing. If you lose, say even less.
9-26.author: Paul Brown

9-27.quote: Knowing how to give in on time is another way to win.
9-27.author: Baltasar Gracián y Morales

9-28.quote: Losing is just another way of winning
9-28.author: Gustavo Moura

9-29.quote: Having money is one thing, knowing how to make money is another.
9-29.author: RB Correa

9-30.quote: ⁠ To win big, sometimes you have to take big risks.
9-30.author: Bill Gates

10-1.quote: If I win an Oscar I will be remembered. And then my life will have meaning
10-1.author: BoJack Horseman

10-2.quote: Certain games, in an attempt to win, only make you lose.
10-2.author: Lavinia Lins

10-3.quote: Earn money but don't let it earn you.
10-3.author: Unknown

10-4.quote: Losing a battle is nothing more than an obligation to win another.
10-4.author: José Martí

10-5.quote: The smartest way to get attention is to not pay attention.
10-5.author: thay crismaltely

10-6.quote: I would rather get coffee than compliments right now.
10-6.author: Louisa May Alcott

10-7.quote: It's not easy to gain my trust, but it's easy to lose it.
10-7.author: Confiter

10-8.quote: And what's the point of gaining the world and losing your soul?
10-8.author: Unknown

10-9.quote: Not everything in life is what we want, sometimes to win you have to lose.
10-9.author: Arthur Borges

10-10.quote: He who works all day has no time to earn money.
10-10.author: John D.Rockefeller

10-11.quote: ⁠ Only you can completely humiliate yourself and still win the night.
10-11.author: Dynasty

10-12.quote: It doesn't matter if you win by a second or a kilometer, winning is winning.
10-12.author: Vin Diesel

10-13.quote: It's better to lose money and make a living than the other way around.
10-13.author: Frei Vicente

10-14.quote: What I know makes me money. What I don't know makes me lose money.
10-14.author: Robert Kiyosaki

10-15.quote: Take a risk! You only have something to lose if you have nothing to gain!
10-15.author: Patrick Leandro

10-16.quote: You can't win them all. The important thing is not to lose them all.
10-16.author: Marinho Guzman

10-17.quote: I have nothing I can lose and there is nothing I want to gain.
10-17.author: Fernanda Magalhães

10-18.quote: sometimes it is better to lose than to win because the suffering is the same.
10-18.author: suellen pires

10-19.quote: It's great to make new friends without neglecting your old ones.
10-19.author: Queen Christina of Sweden

10-20.quote: The calculation of relativity is difficult but conquering you is impossible.
10-20.author: crazy

10-21.quote: It's not by dominating me that you will conquer me.
10-21.author: Legião Urbana

10-22.quote: It is better to conquer yourself than to conquer the world
10-22.author: Buddha

10-23.quote: How to win over a woman in 2 words: DO YOU WANT VODKA???????
10-23.author: Isabela FreitasNote: Shared by the author on social media

10-24.quote: It is necessary to lose the irrelevant to conquer the fundamental.
10-24.author: MGT

10-25.quote: He has plenty of trickery and freedom to conquer.

10-26.quote: The first step to winning a woman's heart is being into her.
10-26.author: Paulo Ricardo Mello

10-27.quote: No one needs to conquer the world, just wisdom to live in it.
10-27.author: VicenteCunha

10-28.quote: The best things in life are the hardest to achieve
10-28.author: Thiago Silva

10-29.quote: Trust is easy to earn and difficult to regain.
10-29.author: iran mnr

10-30.quote: It's easier to conquer an entire city than a wounded friend.
10-30.author: Ricardo Gondim

10-31.quote: To win great victories it is necessary to fight great battles.
10-31.author: Felipe Arco

11-1.quote: Wanting is not power; it can even be, wanting to have; I prefer to conquer to have.
11-1.author: Malik Black )

11-2.quote: Fear and Courage, if used in harmony, lead us to conquer the impossible.
11-2.author: Vinicius Siqueira

11-3.quote: Every man is capable of conquering a woman who dreams...
11-3.author: Josyas

11-4.quote: Conquering others is having power. Conquering ourselves is knowing the way.
11-4.author: Unknown

11-5.quote: How much emotional control do you have to achieve your goals?
11-5.author: Andrelina Lima

11-6.quote: I believe that in the end the truth will win.
11-6.author: John Wycliffe

11-7.quote: A famous tactic of the Devil is to divide and conquer.
11-7.author: Pr. Ronildo Santos

11-8.quote: Knowing how to give up this to achieve that. It's as simple as that.
11-8.author: Thalita Souza

11-9.quote: I will return, after the fights, after conquering my space, I will return.
11-9.author: Chili.

11-10.quote: Achieving prosperity is a task that requires more wisdom than intelligence!
11-10.author: Paulo Eduardo Dubiel

11-11.quote: Do not conquer power, but have the power to conquer.
11-11.author: Ariel Lisboa

11-12.quote: Knowing how to conquer is the secret to not needing to demand...
11-12.author: Thatu Nunes (DraDoAmor)

11-13.quote: ⁠ The secret to success is to achieve what money cannot buy .
11-13.author: The Dream Seller

11-14.quote: We have to be optimistic, think positive that we will achieve our dreams.
11-14.author: Sergio Furquim

11-15.quote: Get customers and they will get more customers for you.
11-15.author: César Mors

11-16.quote: A woman conquers in her eyes, it's like a secret that a man insists on deciphering
11-16.author: Rafael Andradee

11-17.quote: When people show you who they are, believe them the first time.
11-17.author: Maya Angelou

11-18.quote: Incompetence, believe me, has destroyed more politicians than dishonesty.
11-18.author: Ediel

11-19.quote: Believe: The past has no return, and nothing hurts forever.
11-19.author: Caio Fernando Abreu

11-20.quote: If you have a dream, just believe it.
11-20.author: Justin Bieber

11-21.quote: Give importance to your dreams. Believe in yourself. Never give up.
11-21.author: Jefferson Alan

11-22.quote: Have faith and believe, the best is already yours. He has already reserved it for you.
11-22.author: Caio Fernando Abreu

11-23.quote: Photography is a gift. Believe me, one wrong angle changes everything.
11-23.author: Itarcio AL

11-24.quote: I don't need good lawyers, I have the best and believe me he doesn't charge.
11-24.author: Adriano Soares

11-25.quote: Do your part and believe in God. The rest will soon follow.
11-25.author: Hélder Sena de Sousa

11-26.quote: Believe in people but to your limit.
11-26.author: Cilene Uzêda

11-27.quote: Never believe a man's words, but rather his feelings.
11-27.author: Rafael Imamura

11-29.quote: Believe me, your own vulnerability is your greatest strength.
11-29.author: Nay ZASH

11-30.quote: Before anything, believe in yourself, know that you are capable!
11-30.author: LUIZA CAROLINA

12-1.quote: if they talk bad about me, don't believe it...if they talk well, be suspicious.
12-1.author: sersan

12-3.quote: ''Believe: Perfect things are almost always yet to come.''
12-3.author: Rebecka Souza

12-4.quote: Believe in the power of words, after all, all the faith in the world is based on them.
12-4.author: Roger Stankewski

12-5.quote: Believe in yourself. You are capable of much more than you know.
12-5.author: Karen Berg

12-7.quote:
And in silence God always puts everything in 
its rightful place!
Believe...
12-7.author: Paula Monteiro

12-8.quote: Believe me, trying to be someone else is harder than being yourself.
12-8.author: Pr. Ivan Junio (Pastor Insano)

12-9.quote:
- I need you to believe- Believe in what?
- Believe in magic.
12-9.author: Once Upon a Time

12-10.quote: Believe me, everything is better with a good lie.
12-10.author: Pretty Little Liars-Cece Drake

12-11.quote: Believe in yourself, don't waste time believing in others.
12-11.author: Marcelle Figueiredo

12-12.quote: ⁠ Believe:The future becomes a past without a present!
12-12.author: Kovalski Luis

12-13.quote: No matter what happens, believe that tomorrow will be a better day.
12-13.author: Renner Bulcão

12-14.quote: Axiom Number 1: don't believe it, reality is a matter of optics!
12-14.author: Master DeRose

12-15.quote: Never give up on your dreams, even if no one believes in them.
12-15.author: Thalita Rebouças

12-16.quote: There will be a lot of people saying it won't work. Believe in yourself.
12-16.author: Flávio Augusto da Silva

12-17.quote: Fight and conquer, overcome your fears. Believe in your dreams.
12-17.author: AISLAN DLANO

12-18.quote: Have faith, believe and don't stand still
12-18.author: Aquiles Maior

12-19.quote: Winning is not about winning, it's about fighting;
12-19.author: Julio Aukay

12-20.quote: Evolving is fighting, conquering and overcoming the hardships of life
12-20.author: Iaponira Barros

12-21.quote: Winning is for those who are lucky; winning is for those who have the ability.
12-21.author: Dáblio Melo

12-22.quote: Be careful when trying to win at any cost, you end up just like the enemy.
12-22.author: Ed René Kivitz

12-23.quote: You don't always fight to win. You fight for dignity!
12-23.author: Leandro M Ferreira neto

12-24.quote: You really can't beat someone who insists on continuing the argument.
12-24.author: The Heirs (series)

12-25.quote: More important than the will to win is the courage to start.
12-25.author: Roger Stankewski

12-26.quote: Patience is the best way to win.
12-26.author: Saint Anthony of Padua

12-27.quote: No discouragement can be greater than the desire to be happy and win!
12-27.author: Vanessa Pimentel

12-28.quote: Those who don't feel are in charge. Those who think only what they need to win win.
12-28.author: Fernando Pessoa

12-29.quote: Born to lose, live to win.
12-29.author: Lemmy Kilmister

12-30.quote: It's difficult to overcome prejudice, because skin color still has an address.
12-30.author: Luiz Machado

12-31.quote: The great thing in life is to overcome sadness by expressing a beautiful smile.
12-31.author: Mário Pires
